1: I trust in the Lord to keep me safe and secure.
2: I focus on peace and bring people together.
3: My words inspire kindness and positivity with every breath I take.
4: I thrive in safety and guidance on my path.
5: I rise above challenges and stay on my path.
6: I trust in my God and seek His guidance.
7: I feel protected and strong in challenging times.
8: I thrive by uplifting goodness and supporting positive intentions.
9: I trust that others will face the consequences of their actions.
10: I rise above challenges and embrace a brighter path.
11: I embrace positive speech and reject harmful words.
12: I trust that justice and support uplift those in need.
13: I give thanks and dwell in joy and goodness.
